song.title: Overwhelmed
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .D / Em / Bm / G
[1] .G D I see the works of Your Hands .A Bm A G Galaxies spin in a Heavenly dance oh God . D A All that You are is so overwhelming || .G D I hear the sound of Your Voice . A All at once it’s a gentle and .Bm A G Thundering noise oh God . D A All that You are is so overwhelming
[C] . D A I delight myself in You . Bm G Captivated by Your beauty . D A Bm G I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You || . D A God, I run into Your arms . Bm G Unashamed because of mercy . D A D I’m overwhelmed, I’m overwhelmed by You
--- [2] .G D I know the power of Your Cross . A Bm A G Forgiven and free forever You’ll be my God . D A All that You’ve done is so overwhelming
[B] .D A You are Beautiful, You are Beautiful .G Oh God, there is no one more Beautiful .D A G You are Beautiful, God You are the most Beautiful ||
.D A You are Wonderful, You are Wonderful .G Oh God, there is no one more Wonderful .D A G You are Wonderful, God You are the most Wonderful|| .D A
You are Glorious, You are Glorious .G Oh God, there is no one more Glorious .D A G You are Glorious, God You are the most Glorious
